short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DataURL and Base64 converter on the go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Durl is a conversion tool you can use to convert uploaded files to Data URLs, or text to Base64 or back to text.

Changelog:

3.0.0 - 9 / 16 / 2020 - Deleted and re wrote everything, completely different color scheme, rewrote program, added Base64 conversion tools alongside the normal Data URL converter.
